## PolySyncIterable.some() method

Returns `true` if calling `func(element)` returns `true` for at least one element, and `false` otherwise

**Signature:**

```typescript
some(func: IndexedPredicate<T>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | [IndexedPredicate](./polyethylene.indexedpredicate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A function to be called on the elements of the iteration |

**Returns:**

boolean

Whether calling `func` returned `true` on at least one element.

## Remarks

If a call to `func(element)` returns `true`<!-- -->, no more elements are iterated.
